mapper.select: SELECT q.no, q.service_no serviceNo, q.user_no userNo, q.type, q.content, q.reply, q.regdate, u.nick_name userNickName, u.photo_url userPhotoUrl FROM questions q, users u WHERE q.user_no = u.no AND q.service_no = #{no} ORDER BY q.regdate DESC

SELECT q.no, q.service_no serviceNo, q.user_no userNo, q.type, q.content, q.reply, q.regdate, u.nick_name userNickName, u.photo_url userPhotoUrl FROM questions q, users u WHERE q.user_no = u.no AND q.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO questions (no, service_no, user_no, type, content, reply, regdate) VALUES (questions_seq.nextval, #{serviceNo}, #{userNo}, #{type}, #{content}, #{reply}, systimestamp)
mapper.update: UPDATE questions SET type = #{type}, content = #{content}, reply = #{reply}) WHERE no=#{no}
